com.jamieholdstock.crossword.views.ClueV.app:clue: Consumes a portion of meat stew (4)

TextView.android:text:
A cryptic clue normally consists of two parts: a literal definition and an additional hint or cryptic indication of the solution - usually involving some form of wordplay.
The definition part will normally occur at the beginning or end of the clue. Part of the fun is analysing the clue to discover which part is definition and which part is cryptic indication.
The literal defintion in this clue is at the start, 'Consumes'
The rest of the clue 'a portion of meat stew' is a wordplay puzzle. The solution is literally a portion of the letters 'm EATS tew'
Cryptic clues can be trickier to solve, but because two mini-clues both to point the solution EATS, you can be quite sure that it is correct.
